thread.title: Rodney L Veal
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Rodney L Veal

author: Rodney L Veal
title: Rodney L Veal
text: I inadvertently missed the "you must call us to cancel subscription" section of the cancel page. I called expecting a big hassle, but Eric was very helpful. Walked me through the cancellation process and refunded immediately. I only cancelled because we filled the position and don't hire that often. We are a small company and did not need the service any longer. I did hire one of their candidates and would highly recommend.
